stories.Title: Get ready for a trip to the GPT Store
stories.Description: Reports suggest that OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is planning for a marketplace for developers to monetize their AI models built on ChatGPT, bringing AI innovations to a wider audience.
stories.Tweet: Get ready for a trip to the GPT Store 📦 Reports suggest that OpenAI CEO Sam Altman is planning for a marketplace for developers to monetize their AI models built on ChatGPT, bringing AI innovations to a wider audience. #openai https://www.reuters.com/technology/openai-plans-app-store-ai-software-information-2023-06-20/

stories.Title: DeepMind is very proud of RoboCat
stories.Description: Their latest AI model has surpassed expectations, showcasing its ability to solve and adapt to multiple tasks across various robots.
stories.Tweet: DeepMind is very proud of RoboCat 📦 Their latest AI model has surpassed expectations, showcasing its ability to solve and adapt to multiple tasks across various robots. #deepmind https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/21/deepminds-robocat-learns-to-perform-a-range-of-robotics-tasks/

stories.Title: Dropbox's AI-driven solutions
stories.Description: A new document summarization and querying tool is a great addition, but the star of the show is Dash, the universal search engine that effortlessly locates files scattered across platforms.
stories.Tweet: Dropbox's AI-driven solutions 📦 A new document summarization and querying tool is a great addition, but the star of the show is Dash, the universal search engine that effortlessly locates files scattered across platforms. #dropbox https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/21/23767248/dropbox-ai-dash-universal-search

stories.Title: Meetings are a breeze with Otter
stories.Description: The transcription tool now introduces an AI-powered assistant that can answer your questions, assist with tasks, and provide valuable insights during and after your meetings.
stories.Tweet: Meetings are a breeze with Otter 📦 The transcription tool now introduces an AI-powered assistant that can answer your questions, assist with tasks, and provide valuable insights during and after your meetings. #ai https://www.fastcompany.com/90912250/otter-ai-chat-tool-meetings

stories.Title: Who owns AI content?
stories.Description: A recent study from Stanford University calls for better awareness of the legal implications surrounding generative AI.
stories.Tweet: Who owns AI content? 📦 A recent study from Stanford University calls for better awareness of the legal implications surrounding generative AI. #ai https://www.zdnet.com/article/a-thorny-question-who-owns-code-images-and-narratives-generated-by-ai/

stories.Title: Today Texas, tomorrow the world
stories.Description: By requiring Tesla's connector on charging stations, the state gives NACS another push in becoming the North American charging standard.
stories.Tweet: Today Texas, tomorrow the world 📦 By requiring Tesla's connector on charging stations, the state gives NACS another push in becoming the North American charging standard. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/06/21/texas-require-tesla-nacs-connector-on-charging-stations/

stories.Title: Tesla's little secret uncovered
stories.Description: A security researcher has brought to light a hidden wonder in Tesla's vehicles, a setting that frees drivers from constant steering wheel contact while using Autopilot and Full Self-Driving.
stories.Tweet: Tesla's little secret uncovered 📦 A security researcher has brought to light a hidden wonder in Tesla's vehicles, a setting that frees drivers from constant steering wheel contact while using Autopilot and Full Self-Driving. #tesla https://www.cnbc.com/2023/06/20/tesla-secret-configuration-disables-nag-for-autopilot-fsd.html

stories.Title: Mazda's commitment to electrification
stories.Description: A potential partnership between Mazda and Panasonic is being explored to provide lithium-ion batteries for Mazda's future EV lineup, amid the rising demand in the market.
stories.Tweet: Mazda's commitment to electrification 📦 A potential partnership between Mazda and Panasonic is being explored to provide lithium-ion batteries for Mazda's future EV lineup, amid the rising demand in the market. #mazda https://electrek.co/2023/06/21/mazda-explores-ev-battery-partnership-panasonic-energy/

stories.Title: Harness the full power of GitHub Copilot

stories.Title: Attention gamers and content creators!
stories.Description: Voicemod, a Valencia-based startup, has released an AI voice changer and soundboard software that enables real-time voice transformations for its users.

stories.Title: Mercury: Up close and personal
stories.Description: BepiColombo's latest flyby gifted us an extraordinary view of Mercury's surface. The spacecraft's upcoming mission in 2025 promises an unforgettable journey of discovery.
